title: Update ref guide for additional information displayed in cloud view
description:
Cassandra Targett noticed as part of SOLR-11578 that we forgot to update the ref guide. Here is her comment:

Rohit, Erick Erickson, there are a number of changes to the Ref Guide (cloud-screens.adoc) that could have been made with this commit: updated screenshots, a description of the new type labels, and clean up of a section that discusses the Dump screen that no longer exists (not related to this change I think). Are these updates planned for a later time but before 7.5 is released?

I may come back and ask about how to deal with images....

comments.content:
Cassandra Targett I think this is ready I have a few questions though:

1> my screenshots are about twice as big as the ones in already there, 140K or so each. Do they need to be shrunk?

2>  Binary files don't go into the patch very well, want me to just push the changes and review then?

3> I added a new screenshot showing the hover pop-up, so if you apply the patch you'll see a blank image.
comments.author: Erick Erickson

comments.content:
1> my screenshots are about twice as big as the ones in already there, 140K or so each. Do they need to be shrunk?
Preferably. Large images increase the size of the PDF. I just use Preview on the Mac (Tools -> Adjust Size...IIRC I try to do 1024x768)

2> Binary files don't go into the patch very well, want me to just push the changes and review then?

Why don't you go ahead and just commit your changes after trying to shrink the images and I'll take a look afterwards.
